betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The elder wizards of Furatto agreed to meet up with me!
They thanked me for reopening connections back to Terra, allowing them to re-enstablish some of their lost order.
Before the invaders of Terra came, these wizards used to be part of one of the main governing bodies of the land, regulating the use of magic, and promoting collaboration between the various magical septs that used to hold power.
This governing body has been part of the politics of Terra for quite a long time, and it has to do with many of the magic artifact and creatures that originated there, and for banishing the crazed wizards of the Aether islands.
Their symbol is quite peculiar, it mentions a particular figure, the Arbiter, as a mark of order and creation. 
Is this Arbiter their deity? Or just simply a powerful wizard of the past? Maybe the founder of the order of wizards?
Anyhow, this Arbiter clearly played a role in the struggle against the meatballs, but this figure not around anymore. At least, I don't think so?
